meanings.definition: A bar on a computer screen displaying icons for frequently used programs or functions.
meanings.sent1: I always look at the taskbars to quickly open my favorite games.
meanings.sent2: The taskbars at the bottom of my screen help me access my apps easily.
meanings.sent3: When my cat walked on the keyboard, she somehow rearranged all the taskbars!
meanings.sent4: The taskbars on my screen are like a treasure map leading me to my most-used programs.
meanings.sent5: The colorful taskbars make my computer screen look like a busy city skyline.

meanings.definition: A horizontal bar at the bottom of a window that shows open programs or documents.
meanings.sent1: I can see all my open files on the taskbars at the bottom of the window.
meanings.sent2: The taskbars help me switch between different documents quickly.
meanings.sent3: My friend accidentally dragged an open window into the taskbars, causing chaos!
meanings.sent4: The taskbars at the bottom of the window are like a lineup of books waiting to be read.
meanings.sent5: The taskbars glow softly, like a row of fireflies guiding me through my work.
